== Mulavukad (CT) (628011) ==

Mulavukad (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 19.27 sq. km. and harbouring 5315 households with total population of 21833 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 4 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 222 km. Male population is 10633 and female population is 11200. Scheduled Caste population is 2681 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the town is 628011<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 9 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 9 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam at a distance of 2 km.
